title: Best of the Program | Guest: Lincoln Jay | 2/21/22
description:
Video journalist for Rebel News Lincoln Jay joins to share what he saw firsthand at the Canada protests. Glenn takes calls from various listeners, including truckers, across Canada and America to gauge how they're feeling and what needs to be done. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
